data.message: Hello, can you please help with this issue; The LIKE and COMMENT buttons are not showing on my posts for friends and/or public to interact with?? The only button that shows is the SHARE button. I made sure in the Settings section that Everyone can Like or Comment on my posts. I reported this issue 3 months ago on Aug 11, and three other times... No response and the issue is still occurring. Can you help fix this? Thanks

replies.message: Hi there. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this. If something's not working on Facebook, please let us know. You can learn how to report a broken feature here: http://bit.ly/2zBVd1W. -Tenaya
Facebook i did report it on broken feature, no response and issue is still happening. Please help fix, Thanks
Hey Jorge. We appreciate you taking the time to report it. However, we receive a large volume of reports, so it may take some time to get to yours. Thanks for your patience! -Elizabeth
